address.description: address is the address to query balances for.

denom.description: denom is the coin denom to query balances for.

QuerySpendableBalanceByDenomRequest.title: Query Spendable Balance By Denom Request
QuerySpendableBalanceByDenomRequest.description: QuerySpendableBalanceByDenomRequest defines the gRPC request structure for querying an account's spendable balance for a specific denom.
